characters.name: Chise Hatori
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155cm

Chise Hatori is a Sleigh Beggy and one of the main protagonists of the series. She is the apprentice and wife of Elias Ainsworth.
Devoid of love from a young age, Chise has a mysterious connection to magic, which causes her to attract fairies. She learns more about her magical abilities as she finds herself in the care and tutelage of Elias, a powerful mage.

(Source: Ancient Magus Bride Wiki & Crunchyroll)

characters.name: Elias Ainsworth
alt_names: エリアス・エインズワーズ
characters.description:
He is an ancient magician with both human and fae characteristics. Despite his appearance, he is gentle and polite with humans and shows a great interest in them. He understands why humans feel the emotions they do, but has never experienced them himself. 

One day, he buys [Hatori Chise](https://anilist.co/character/88344/Chise-Hatori) from the black market and makes her his Mage Apprentice.

characters.name: Cartaphilus
characters.description:
Cartaphilus is a sorcerer that serves as a recurring antagonist of the series. ~!Later is found out that Cartaphilus is actually an unknown being that has lived for over 2000 years, that was found by and later fused with a man called Joseph.!~

(Source: The Ancient Magus Bride Wikia)

characters.name: Titania
characters.description: Titania is the queen of the fairies and wife to Oberon. She looks like a beautiful woman riding a donkey. She is an acquaintance of Elias Ainsworth and appears to know something about his origin. She does not discriminate against Elias for being a part fairy and part something else.

characters.name: Oberon
characters.description: The faerie king and husband of Titania. He resembles a satyr, with hooves and deer antlers.

characters.name: Silky
characters.description: House keeper of Elias and Chise's residence.

characters.name: Ruth
characters.description: Chise's familiar and a Church Grim. He shares a mental link with Chise and considers her a sister.

characters.name: Simon Callum
characters.description: The priest who lives in the village near Elias' house and is an acquaintance of his.

characters.name: Lindel
alt_names: Song of Flowes 白花の歌
characters.description:
Elias' magician master, commonly referred to as Lindel, who lives in the Land of Dragons. His title is Echoes, Song of Flowers.

(Source: MAL)

characters.name: Ethan Barklem
alt_names: イーサン・バークレム
characters.description: An ordinary human and the younger brother of Stella.

characters.name: Chika Hatori
characters.description: The wife of Yuuki Hatori and the mother of Chise and Fumiki Hatori.

characters.name: Yuuki Hatori
characters.description: The husband of Chika Hatori and the father of Chise and Fumiki Hatori.

characters.name: Joel Garland
alt_names: ジョエル・ガーランド
characters.description: A widowed old man who took care of a rose garden. A vampire resided with him, and while he didn't have the ability to see her, he was somewhat sensitive to her presence on a subconscious level.

characters.name: Seth Noel
characters.description: An auctioneer working at the Black Market.

characters.name: Redcurrant
characters.description: A Leánnan sídhe that watches over Garland's Household. Her name was given to her by Chise Hatori.
